cause.description:
We Value . . .
Trust We believe in trusting individuals and providing them with the information they need to make well-informed decisions.
Equality We believe that women should have an equal place at life's table and be respected as moral decision makers.
Responsibility We believe that every right is tied to responsibility and that the fulfillment of responsibility is itself a source of joy.
Diversity We believe in inclusion and diversity - and the power and knowledge they confer.
Conviction We believe in passion - for change, for justice, for easing the plight of others, for caring, for living our convictions and confronting inhumane acts.
Honor We believe that children flourish best in families and communities where they are nurtured, honored and loved.
www.ppmhv.org
1. Expand access to safe, affordable contraception, preventive health screenings and comprehensive, compassionate care.
2. Our Education Department is the second largest in New York State and strives to provide comprehensive information to individuals in our community on a variety of issues.
3. Our advocacy program, informed by Margaret Sanger's vision, works to ensure our fundamental reproductive rights.
cause.mission: Ensure equal access to quality reproductive services, protect the freedom to choose and to build stronger communities and families.
cause.name: Planned Parenthood of the Mid-Hudson Valley, Inc.
